name: Headings towards...
description:
Heading Towards is a mini game we developed during the Goethe game Jam in Greece. It's a minimalist puzzle platformer. You are going through a series of events - the challenges of life - your memories. You are called to confront these challenges and see what the resolution will be. The game will judge you...

The design of the game is very minimal and cryptic in purpose. Part of the game is interpret and decode the information provided however you like.

For the controls use the left and right arrows to move and space to jump and/or double jump.
